title: In mice, the new BA.5 booster works about the same as BA.1 shot FDA passed up
description: Sans human data, mouse study offers first direct comparison of the two omicron boosters.

title: Our biggest remaining PlayStation VR2 questions have been answered
description: Plus, a wrap-up of Sony's TGS 2022 biggies: God of War: Ragnarok, Tekken 8.

title: Iranians hacked US companies, sent ransom demands to printers, indictment says
description: Alleged victims include domestic violence shelter that paid hackers $13,000.

title: Regulators put the brakes on Microsoft’s Activision acquisition
description: Microsoft faces prolonged competition investigation into $75 billion acquisition.

title: China’s most advanced AI image generator already blocks political content
description: Baidu's ERNIE-ViLG text-to-image model prevents users from creating political images.

title: California says Amazon ruined online shopping, sues it for driving up prices
description: Lawsuit mirrors DC's case dismissed in April. Now, DOJ backs DC's appeal.

title: Ford gives dealers 2 months to accept new rules or stop selling EVs
description: From 2024, Ford EVs will only be sold at Model e-certified dealerships.

title: San Francisco sued by woman who says her rape-kit DNA was used to arrest her
description: Jane Doe "was re-victimized by this unconstitutional practice," lawsuit says.

title: HP to pay EU printer customers $1.35 million for disabling third-party ink
description: New printers still block non-HP ink, but HP is compensating for lack of advance notice.

title: AT&T won’t upgrade “older” phones for new 5G bands
description: Only the very latest Apple and Samsung devices can ride the 3.45 GHz wave.

title: Today’s best deals: Anker noise-canceling headphones, USB-C chargers, and more
description: Dealmaster also has LG OLED TVs, MacBooks, and gaming accessories.

title: Big Tech must prove content moderation works or pay $15K daily fines in Calif.
description: New law responds to concerns over Big Tech's alleged role in US Capitol riot.

title: EA’s new anti-cheat tools dip into the dreaded “kernel mode”
description: Publisher promises robust privacy and system security efforts to protect users.

title: Five years of data show that SSDs are more reliable than HDDs over the long haul
description: Backblaze tracks reliability for thousands of HDDs and SSDs in its data centers.

title: Human trafficking’s newest abuse: Forcing victims into cyberscamming
description: Thousands of people from across Asia have been coerced into defrauding people everywhere.

title: EU upholds Google’s 4.1B euro fine for bundling search with Android
description: Google will have to pay the EU's biggest fine ever.

title: Sampling BMW’s greatest hits shows what’s missing from its modern cars
description: Driving M cars from 2001, 2013, and 2022 shows some lessons for the future.
